description: Fast text-to-video generation model with high-quality output and quick processing times

prompt.description: The text prompt to guide video generation
prompt.placeholder: A medium shot establishes a modern, minimalist office setting...

aspect_ratio.description: Aspect ratio of the generated video

seed.description: Random seed for reproducibility. If None, a random seed is chosen

enable_safety_checker.description: If set to true, input data will be checked for safety before processing

enable_prompt_expansion.description: Whether to enable prompt expansion using a large language model

prompt_details.style_guide: Focus on detailed scene descriptions with camera movements, lighting, and character details
best_practices: Include specific camera angles and movements

prompt_structure.subject_details: Detail characters, objects, and their appearance

example_prompts.title: Professional Office Scene
example_prompts.prompt: A medium shot establishes a modern, minimalist office setting: clean lines, muted grey walls, and polished wood surfaces. The focus shifts to a close-up on a woman in sharp, navy blue business attire. Her crisp white blouse contrasts with the deep blue of her tailored suit jacket. The subtle texture of the fabric is visibleâ€”a fine weave with a slight sheen. Her expression is serious, yet engaging, as she speaks to someone unseen just beyond the frame. Close-up on her eyes, showing the intensity of her gaze and the fine lines around them that hint at experience and focus. Her lips are slightly parted, as if mid-sentence. The light catches the subtle highlights in her auburn hair, meticulously styled. Note the slight catch of light on the silver band of her watch. High resolution 4k

request.prompt: A cat playing with a ball of yarn in a cozy living room
A dramatic sunset over a mountain range, camera slowly panning left to reveal a lone figure standing on a cliff edge, silhouetted against the golden sky

url.description: URL where the video can be downloaded

content_type.description: MIME type of the video file

file_size.description: Size of the video file in bytes

prompt.description: The text prompt used for video generation

usage_tips: Use detailed, cinematic descriptions for best results
Include camera movements and angles in your prompts
Specify lighting conditions for better atmosphere
Enable prompt expansion for more detailed scenes
Use consistent seed values for reproducible results
limitations: Maximum video duration is limited by the model
Complex scenes with many moving elements may be challenging
Safety checker may filter inappropriate content
Processing time varies based on resolution and complexity

pricing.estimated_cost: Varies based on resolution and duration
